section.p: To renounce the worship of Tambu, you must pay 40 Shards to the shamans by way of compensation.
'Fool! Those who incur the wrath of Tambu will never survive the steppes!' says a passing worshipper.

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 40 Shards and erase Tambu from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
